definitions.definition: An ancient stringed musical instrument (a yoke lute chordophone ) of Greek origin, consisting of two arms extending from a body to a crossbar (a yoke ), and strings, parallel to the soundboard , connecting the body to the yoke.

subdefinitions.definition: Any instrument of the same musicological classification; any yoke lute .

definitions.definition: A lyre-shaped sheet music holder that attaches to a wind instrument when a music stand is impractical.

main_definition: ( music ) An ancient stringed musical instrument (a yoke lute chordophone ) of Greek origin, consisting of two arms extending from a body to a crossbar (a yoke ), and strings, parallel to the soundboard , connecting the body to the yoke.
secondary_definitions: A lyre-shaped sheet music holder that attaches to a wind instrument when a music stand is impractical.
( obsolete ) A composer of lyric poetry.
